channel.title: Getting-starteds on devAny - develop anywhere with your mobile
channel.description: Recent content in Getting-starteds on devAny - develop anywhere with your mobile

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Installation on Server This setup is NOT secure. Secure connection is highly recommended. Please follow this devAny Docker image helps to set up processes. Please install docker by following docker installation After docker is installed, you just run the following command. $ sudo docker run -d -h devany \ -v /home/devany:/home/<USERNAME> -e HOME=/home/<USERNAME> -e USERNAME=<USERNAME> -e PASSWORD=<YOUR PASSWORD> \ -p 8888:8888 -p 3000:5000 shohey1226/devany:latest Please set your <USERNAME> and <YOUR PASSWORD>.
